channel.title: Create Cluster on Weaveworks Introduction to GitOps w/ AWS EKS
channel.description: Recent content in Create Cluster on Weaveworks Introduction to GitOps w/ AWS EKS

item.title: Create EKS Cluster
item.description: Before creating the EKS cluster, please make sure that you have the right role. aws sts get-caller-identity --query Arn | grep TeamRole -q && echo "IAM role valid" || echo "IAM role NOT valid" If the IAM role is not valid, DO NOT PROCEED. Go back and confirm the steps on this page. Once you have ensured your IAM role is valid, proceed to define your cluster configuration. Create a cluster.
